config.neo4j.topic.cypher.mirea.public.spec: WITH event WHERE event.op = 'c' MERGE (s:Spec {id: event.after.id}) ON CREATE SET s.title = event.after.title, s.cafedra_id = event.after.cafedra_id ON MATCH SET s.title = event.after.title, s.cafedra_id = event.after.cafedra_id WITH s, event MATCH (c:Cafedra {id: s.cafedra_id}) MERGE (c)-[:HAS_SPEC]->(s)
